mapper.select: SELECT t1.*, t2.appointment_sum, t3.pay_sum from (SELECT nj.NUM_ROUTE_ID, nj.VC_ROUTE_NO, nj.DAT_DEPART_DATE, nj.NUM_MANNED_TYPE, nj.NUM_MAX_PASSENGERS, nj.NUM_UNIT_PRICE, nj.NUM_ROUTE_STATE, ntc.VC_CITY_NAME start_city_name, ntc2.VC_CITY_NAME end_city_name from nnt_journey nj LEFT JOIN nnt_travel_city ntc on nj.NUM_START_TRAVEL_CITY_ID = ntc.NUM_TRAVEL_CITY_ID LEFT JOIN nnt_travel_city ntc2 on nj.NUM_END_TRAVEL_CITY_ID = ntc2.NUM_TRAVEL_CITY_ID where nj.NUM_USER_ID = #{numUserId}) t1 LEFT JOIN (select nj1.NUM_ROUTE_ID, count(nuj.NUM_ROUTE_ID) appointment_sum from nnt_journey nj1 left JOIN nnt_user_journey nuj on nj1.NUM_ROUTE_ID = nuj.NUM_ROUTE_ID and nuj.NUM_STATE = 1 and nuj.NUM_PAY_STATE = 1 where nj1.NUM_USER_ID = #{numUserId} GROUP BY nj1.NUM_ROUTE_ID) t2 on t1.NUM_ROUTE_ID = t2.NUM_ROUTE_ID LEFT JOIN (select nj1.NUM_ROUTE_ID, count(nuj.NUM_ROUTE_ID) pay_sum from nnt_journey nj1 left JOIN nnt_user_journey nuj on nj1.NUM_ROUTE_ID = nuj.NUM_ROUTE_ID and nuj.NUM_STATE = 1 and nuj.NUM_PAY_STATE = 2 where nj1.NUM_USER_ID = #{numUserId} GROUP BY nj1.NUM_ROUTE_ID) t3 on t1.NUM_ROUTE_ID = t3.NUM_ROUTE_ID

SELECT t1.*, t2.appointment_sum, t3.pay_sum from (SELECT nj.NUM_ROUTE_ID, nj.VC_ROUTE_NO, nj.DAT_DEPART_DATE, DATE_FORMAT(nj.DAT_DEPART_DATE,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') START_TIME, nj.NUM_MANNED_TYPE, nj.NUM_MAX_PASSENGERS, nj.NUM_UNIT_PRICE, nj.NUM_ROUTE_STATE, ntc.NUM_TRAVEL_CITY_ID start_city_id, ntc.VC_CITY_NAME start_city_name, ntc2.NUM_TRAVEL_CITY_ID end_city_id, ntc2.VC_CITY_NAME end_city_name from nnt_journey nj LEFT JOIN nnt_travel_city ntc on nj.NUM_START_TRAVEL_CITY_ID = ntc.NUM_TRAVEL_CITY_ID LEFT JOIN nnt_travel_city ntc2 on nj.NUM_END_TRAVEL_CITY_ID = ntc2.NUM_TRAVEL_CITY_ID where nj.NUM_ROUTE_ID = #{numRouteId}) t1 LEFT JOIN (select nj1.NUM_ROUTE_ID, count(nuj.NUM_ROUTE_ID) appointment_sum from nnt_journey nj1 left JOIN nnt_user_journey nuj on nj1.NUM_ROUTE_ID = nuj.NUM_ROUTE_ID and nuj.NUM_STATE = 1 and nuj.NUM_PAY_STATE = 1 GROUP BY nj1.NUM_ROUTE_ID) t2 on t1.NUM_ROUTE_ID = t2.NUM_ROUTE_ID LEFT JOIN (select nj1.NUM_ROUTE_ID, count(nuj.NUM_ROUTE_ID) pay_sum from nnt_journey nj1 left JOIN nnt_user_journey nuj on nj1.NUM_ROUTE_ID = nuj.NUM_ROUTE_ID and nuj.NUM_STATE = 1 and nuj.NUM_PAY_STATE = 2 GROUP BY nj1.NUM_ROUTE_ID) t3 on t1.NUM_ROUTE_ID = t3.NUM_ROUTE_ID
